title: Promises of God Week 2 with Scarlet Hiltibidal
description:
It’s week two of She Reads Truth’s Promises of God study, and Raechel is joined by SRT’s managing editor, Jessica Lamb, and special guest, Scarlet Hiltibidal. Scarlet is a friend, author, and lover of Scripture, and she knows what it means to step out of fear and into the amazing promises of God. Together they talk about why planes don’t bounce, why it’s good to own chickens during a pandemic, and who draws the best Bible-margin praise hands. (Spoiler: It’s Amanda!) The promises Jesus made to all believers are sometimes shocking, but they are all beautiful, good, and true—and we need to hear them right now.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Promises of God reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com.
